query:
ALTER TABLE employees 
MODIFY COLUMN email VARCHAR(320) NULL,
MODIFY COLUMN hireDate DATETIME NULL,
MODIFY COLUMN departmentId INT NULL,
MODIFY COLUMN positionId INT NULL
